final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    subgraph Accounts Payable
        A1[Receive invoice]
        A2[Perform three-way matching]
        A3[Trigger bank transfer]
        A4[Send payment advice to vendor]
        A5[Payment successful?]
        A6[Contact vendor]
        A7[Attempt transfer again]
    end

    subgraph Goods Receipt Department
        G1[Receive goods]
        G2[Check quantity and quality]
        G3[Generate goods receipt form]
        G4[Forward goods to employee]
        G5[Send form to Accounts Payable]
        G6[Issues with goods?]
        G7[Return to vendor]
        G8[Notify Purchasing and Accounts Payable]
    end

    subgraph Employee
        E1[Start]
        E2[Fill purchase request form]
        E3[Collect vendor quotes]
        E4[Complete form]
        E5[Get supervisor approval]
        E6{Approved?}
        E7[Modify and resubmit]
        E8[Forward to Purchasing Dept.]
    end

    subgraph Purchasing Department
        P1[Check completeness]
        P2{Complete?}
        P3[Return to employee]
        P4[Enter request in enterprise system]
        P5[Select vendor]
        P6{Vendor in system?}
        P7[Add new vendor]
        P8[Generate purchase order]
        P9[Send PO to vendor]
        P10[Send PO copy to Accounts Payable]
    end

    %% Flows for Accounts Payable
    A1 --> A2
    A2 --> A3
    A3 --> A4
    A4 --> A5
    A5 -->|Yes| A6
    A5 -->|No| A7

    %% Flows for Goods Receipt Department
    G1 --> G2
    G2 --> G3
    G3 --> G4
    G3 --> G5
    G2 --> G6
    G6 -->|Yes| G7
    G6 -->|No| G8

    %% Flows for Employee
    E1 --> E2
    E2 --> E3
    E3 --> E4
    E4 --> E5
    E5 --> E6
    E6 -->|Yes| E8
    E6 -->|No| E7

    %% Flows for Purchasing Department
    E8 --> P1
    P1 --> P2
    P2 -->|Yes| P4
    P2 -->|No| P3
    P4 --> P5
    P5 --> P6
    P6 -->|Yes| P8
    P6 -->|No| P7
    P8 --> P9
    P8 --> P10
